hero.heading: Hay! I’m Hadi
hero.description: Motivated and detail-oriented Web Developer with 6 months of experience.

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR FRONTEND PROJECTS
about.description: Motivated and detail-oriented fresher web developer with a strong foundation in front-end technologies, including React.js . Passionate about creating responsive and user-friendly web applications. Eager to apply my skills, learn new technologies, and contribute to a dynamic development team. Seeking an opportunity to grow as a web developer and build innovative digital solutions

details.title: Website Design for Portfolio Design
details.description: I am a passionate Frontend Developer with expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Tailwind CSS. I specialize in building responsive, user-friendly web applications with clean and maintainable code. With a strong foundation in modern UI/UX principles, I create visually appealing and high-performing web experiences. I also have experience using GitHub for version control and collaboration.        Always eager to learn and explore new technologies to enhance my development skills.

allService.title: Website Design
allService.subTitle: Website design is the process of creating, planning, and building websites. It involves layout, colors, typography, images, user experience (UX), and functionality to make a site visually appealing and user-friendly.It also includes responsiveness, ensuring the website looks great on all devices, from desktops to smartphones.

allService.title: Frontend Development
allService.subTitle: Frontend development is the process of building the user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) of a website or web application. It involves designing and coding everything that users see and interact with directly in a browser.Tailwind css is the framework for styling and React.js is the js library for building user interface

allService.title: Mobile videography
allService.subTitle: capturing high-quality videos using a smartphone. With advance in smartphone cameras, you can now create professional-looking videos without expensive gear. Whether you're a content creator,vlogger  or just someone who loves shooting videos, mobile videography offers a powerful and accessible way to tell stories.

allService.title: Capcut
allService.subTitle: CapCut is a powerful, free, and user-friendly video editing app designed for mobile content creators. Developed by Bytedance (the creators of TikTok), CapCut offers professional editing tools, special effects, and AI-powered features—perfect for making high-quality videos for social media, vlogs, or even professional projects.

allExperience.companyDescription: A company providing training and services in software development.• Gained hands-on experience in Frontend Development, working with HTML, CSS, JavScript, React.js, and Tailwind CSS, Node.js to build responsive and interactive web applications. • Developed projects using GitHub for version control, ensuring efficient collaboration and code management. • Gained practical exposure to UI/UX designprinciples, working within design frameworks to create user-friendly interfaces.• Worked in WCFrames for Editing and videography, incorporating multimedia elements to enhance web content and digital experiences. .

A company providing training and services in software development.• Gained hands-on experience in Frontend Development, working with HTML, CSS, JavScript, React.js, and Tailwind CSS, Node.js to build responsive and interactive web applications. • Developed projects using GitHub for version control, ensuring efficient collaboration and code management. • Gained practical exposure to UI/UX designprinciples, working within design frameworks to create user-friendly interfaces.• Worked in WCFrames for Editing and videography, incorporating multimedia elements to enhance web content and digital experiences. .

Enthusiastic and detail-oriented Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) graduate from Kannur University with a strong foundation in programming, software development, and database management. Passionate about technology and problem-solving, with a keen interest in web development and application design. Eager to apply skills and knowledge in a dynamic work environment.

A company providing training and services insoftware development.• Gained hands-on experience in Frontend Development, working with HTML, CSS, JavScript, React.js, and Tailwind CSS, Node.js to build responsive and interactive web applications. • Developed projects using GitHub for version control, ensuring efficient collaboration and code management. • Gained practical exposure to UI/UX designprinciples, working within design frameworks to create user-friendly interfaces.• Worked in WCFrames for Editing and videography, incorporating multimedia elements to enhance web content and digital experiences. .
